content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <metadata xml:lang="en"> <Esri> <CreaDate>20150225</CreaDate> <CreaTime>15421400</CreaTime> <ArcGISFormat>1.0</ArcGISFormat> <ArcGISstyle>Item Description</ArcGISstyle> <SyncOnce>TRUE</SyncOnce> </Esri> <dataIdInfo> <idAbs>Benthic cover (habitat) maps are derived from aerial imagery, underwater photos, acoustic surveys, and data gathered from sediment samples. Shallow to moderate-depth benthic habitat information assists ecosystem-based marine resource management. Many habitats, including hard and soft corals, are home to a diversity of marine organisms, which provide many important ecosystem services, including fishing, tourism, water quality enhancement, and shoreline protection. Coral reef ecosystems and associated bottom types are under increasing pressure from environmental and anthropogenic stressors. Mitigating these threats requires analyzing their spatial distribution, making benthic habitat mapping a key component to the conservation and management activities of state and federal agencies. This map service presents spatial information about MarineCadastre.gov services across the United States and Territories in the Web Mercator projection. The service was developed by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), but may contain data and information from a variety of data sources, including non-NOAA data. NOAA provides the information \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdas-is\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and shall incur no responsibility or liability as to the completeness or accuracy of this information. NOAA assumes no responsibility arising from the use of this information. The NOAA Office for Coastal Management will make every effort to provide continual access to this service but it may need to be taken down during routine IT maintenance or in case of an emergency. If you plan to ingest this service into your own application and would like to be informed about planned and unplanned service outages or changes to existing services, please register for our Data Services Newsletter (http://coast.noaa.gov/digitalcoast/publications/subscribe). For additional information, please contact the NOAA Office for Coastal Management (coastal.info@noaa.gov). </idAbs> <searchKeys> <keyword>Oceans</keyword> <keyword>Marine</keyword> <keyword>National</keyword> <keyword>renewable energy</keyword> <keyword>offshore</keyword> <keyword>renewables</keyword> <keyword>energy</keyword> </searchKeys> <idPurp>MarineCadastre.gov map service depicting benthic cover (habitat).</idPurp> <idCredit>MarineCadastre.gov</idCredit> <resConst> <Consts> <useLimit>None</useLimit> </Consts> </resConst> <idCitation> <resTitle>BenthicCover</resTitle> </idCitation> </dataIdInfo> <Binary> <Thumbnail> <Data EsriPropertyType="PictureX"></Data> </Thumbnail> </Binary> </metadata>
